content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > you are very welcome to join the sweet > bee crochet community connect with > other crocheters and find inspiration > for your next project click here to > join 1 crochet this quick and cozy one skein project using a single caron cake made using only one stitch this scarf works up nicely with self striping yarn and is relaxing and enjoyable to crochet special stitch tutorials are included the finished scarf measures approximately 64 inches long and 7 inches wide **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions us terms - clear photos - special stitch tutorials - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 370 yards of worsted weight yarn i used yarnspirations caron cakes in the red velvet colourway - 5mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
